value.package.json:
{
  "name": "mechanics-of-motherhood",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "type": "module",
  "license": "MIT",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "vite",
    "build": "npm run clean && npm run build:github && npm run build:ssr && npm run prerender && npm run ssg",
    "build:prerender": "npm run prerender",
    "build:static": "vite build && node scripts/inject-build-version.js",
    "build:ssr": "vite build --ssr src/ssr-entry.tsx --outDir ../dist/server",
    "build:with-data": "npm run fetch-data && npm run build:static",
    "build:seo": "npm run generate:sitemap && npm run build",
    "build:github": "npm run fetch-data && npm run generate:sitemap && npm run validate-data && npm run validate:seo && vite build && node scripts/inject-build-version.js",
    "fetch-data": "node scripts/fetch-data.js",
    "validate-data": "node scripts/validate-data.js",
    "validate-data:fix": "node scripts/validate-data.js --fix-issues",
    "validate:seo": "node scripts/validate-seo-assets.js",
    "test-api": "node scripts/test-api.js",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "preview:github": "vite preview --base=/MechanicsOfMotherhood/",
    "check": "tsc",
    "lint": "eslint . --ext ts,tsx --report-unused-disable-directives",
    "lint:fix": "eslint . --ext ts,tsx --fix",
    "clean": "node scripts/clean.js",
    "clean:all": "npm run clean && node -e \"const fs = require('fs'); try { fs.rmSync('node_modules', { recursive: true, force: true }); fs.rmSync('package-lock.json', { force: true }); console.log('Removed node_modules and package-lock.json. Run npm install to reinstall dependencies.'); } catch (e) { console.log('Failed to remove some files:', e.message); }\"",
    "prepare-v4": "node scripts/prepare-v4-migration.js",
    "tailwind:check": "npx tailwindcss --help",
    "generate:sitemap": "node scripts/generate-sitemap.js",
    "seo:build": "npm run generate:sitemap && npm run build",
    "seo:validate": "echo 'SEO validation tools would run here - check lighthouse, structured data testing, etc.'",
    "deploy:check": "npm run check && npm run validate-data && npm run build:github && npm run preview:github",
    "prerender": "node scripts/prerender.js",
    "ssg": "tsx scripts/ssg.ts",
    "analyze": "vite build --mode production && npx rollup-plugin-visualizer --json stats.json --template treemap --sourcemap false || true",
    "test": "vitest run",
    "test:watch": "vitest",
    "test:ui": "vitest --ui",
    "test:coverage": "vitest run --coverage",
    "quality:check": "node scripts/quality-check.js",
    "quality:a11y": "node scripts/check-a11y.js",
    "quality:links": "node scripts/check-links.js",
    "quality:all": "npm run quality:check && npm run quality:a11y && npm run quality:links"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@radix-ui/react-dialog": "^1.1.15",
    "@radix-ui/react-separator": "^1.1.8",
    "@radix-ui/react-slot": "^1.2.4",
    "@radix-ui/react-toast": "^1.2.15",
    "@radix-ui/react-tooltip": "^1.2.8",
    "@tailwindcss/typography": "^0.5.19",
    "@tailwindcss/vite": "^4.1.18",
    "class-variance-authority": "^0.7.1",
    "clsx": "^2.1.1",
    "dotenv": "^17.2.3",
    "lucide-react": "^0.562.0",
    "react": "^19.2.3",
    "react-dom": "^19.2.3",
    "react-helmet-async": "^2.0.5",
    "react-markdown": "^10.1.0",
    "tailwind-merge": "^3.4.0",
    "tailwindcss": "^4.1.18",
    "tailwindcss-animate": "^1.0.7",
    "web-vitals": "^5.1.0",
    "wouter": "^3.9.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@eslint/js": "^9.39.2",
    "@testing-library/dom": "^10.4.1",
    "@testing-library/jest-dom": "^6.9.1",
    "@testing-library/react": "^16.3.2",
    "@testing-library/user-event": "^14.6.1",
    "@types/node": "^25.0.9",
    "@types/react": "^19.2.9",
    "@types/react-dom": "^19.2.3",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^8.53.1",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^8.53.1",
    "@vitejs/plugin-react": "^5.1.2",
    "@vitest/coverage-v8": "^4.0.17",
    "esbuild-register": "^3.6.0",
    "eslint": "^9.39.2",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.37.5",
    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^7.0.1",
    "eslint-plugin-react-refresh": "^0.4.26",
    "fast-xml-parser": "^5.3.3",
    "glob": "^13.0.0",
    "jsdom": "^27.4.0",
    "rollup-plugin-visualizer": "^6.0.5",
    "tsx": "^4.21.0",
    "typescript": "5.9.3",
    "typescript-eslint": "^8.53.1",
    "vite": "^7.3.1",
    "vitest": "^4.0.17"
  }
}
